reporting-org.narrative: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy

title.narrative: Philipines - Weather and Climate Science for Service Partnership S E Asia (WCSSP) - Met Office

description.narrative: Programme to help improve modelling capability of high impact weather in the region, enabling mitigation of risk from extreme weather events

Strengthened partnership between meteorological services in UK, Philippines, Malaysia and Indonesia to produce scoping study identifying Philippines/ S-E Asian region weather forecasting and climate research priorities. This includes training needs analysis for future capacity building work and initial survey of severe weather and DRR services.
